title: Colorado Clinical and Translational Sciences Institute
author: Wendy Meyer; September
description: Read about scientific breakthroughs, important research activity and CCTSI resources in our quarterly newsletter, Found in Translation.
cleaned_text: Scott Simpson, MD, MPH, is an emergency psychiatrist at [Denver Health Medical Center](https://www.denverhealth.org/) and an associate professor of psychiatry in the University of Colorado School of Medicine. Several years ago, he and his colleagues were working with the Denver Police Department to expand the use of suboxone treatment for individuals with opioid use disorder.
